The Arab American Family Support Center (AAFSC), a nonprofit organization that supports and promotes family cohesion in the greater Los Angeles region, announced that the University of California Los Angeles (UCLA) has joined over 25 other universities nationwide in a unique project to help families of all cultures to talk about sensitive issues such as sexual abuse, date rape and dating violence in a proactive, positive and healing manner.โThe UCLA project will educate UCLA students about preventing sexual abuse and assault. This includes creating a university-wide policy on sexual assault and abuse prevention and training a new generation of men and women on what constitutes healthy relationships,โ said Saba Ahmad, executive director of AAFSC, which has a campus office on the UCLA campus.The โA Call To Menโ Project has established itself as one of the most impactful campus prevention programs in the country. Founded by AAFSC in partnership with the New York University Center for Gender and Sexuality Studies, the program has reached over 150,000 students, more than 3,000 men and women.

In other words, this means that it is moving to block the humanitarian work of the Syrian people. This is completely illegal, and a violation of international law and conventions.https://twitter.com/nabihalalansari/status/1205681550482360224?s=19Today, the Assad regime is in the grip of extreme sectarianism and extremism and this is the reason for its insistence on refusing the evacuation of the displaced Syrians and forcibly displacing them from the area that they are living in. This policy is clear evidence of the Syrian regimeโs sectarian approach and disregard for all laws, principles, and values that govern human life.I would like to emphasize here that the world must not overlook the suffering and injustice that the Syrian people have been enduring and the fact that the Syrian regime has been violating international law, conventions, humanitarian principles, and the principle of neutrality. This is the reason why the Syrian regime insists on refusing aid and evacuating civilians and has closed the main passage ways into Damascus, even the humanitarian passages.As for the issue of the displaced persons, we have announced our position on that.

ุงูููุญูPosted on by martyrashrakatBy Elijah J. Magnier:Translated from Al-Masdar NewsThe third day of the Great Battle of Idlib, the battle for victory, was decisive. Russian airpower did not participate during the first two days of the battle, which led some sources to believe that the battle would be short. The Russian intervention took place on the night of the second day, with the arrival of a number of heavy Su-34 and Su-35 jets.

ุงูุฑูุฌ ุงููููุฒูThe "Tunisian Popular Struggle" (ูุทุงูุจ ุชุญูู ูุงูุฉ ุงูููุงุนุงุช ุงูุฌููุฉ) is an Algerian anarchist collective active in the Tunisian city of Tunis and other Algerian cities, and is connected with the global anarchist network Black Cat.In Tunisia, the organization calls for the self-determination of the Kabyle people, and the establishment of an egalitarian and classless society in line with Bakuninism. They have expressed support for the ongoing struggles in Algeria, and have condemned the military junta there.The organization has participated in the creation of various publications, including the bi-monthly al-Mawrid newspaper and the newspaper al-Mawsila (ุงููุนูุงุฏุฉ) in the French language.
